Please note that this bug and in general the implementation of this endpoint is not part of our PR that was scoped to add support for live import provider

timeline.author: tdonohue

replies.bodyText:
It will be called, as the same as contributeMetadata, but "values" will be an empty array in any cases except on this line of the ArXiv XML (e.g.):
    <id>http://arxiv.org/abs/1911.11405v1</id>

because the OMElement have to match the XPath expression "ns:id" as defined in arxiv-integration.xml on dc.identifier.other metadatum.
In the matching case, values.value is http://arxiv.org/abs/1911.11405v1. We need 1911.11405v1 which is the ID. parseValue manipulate this string in order to extract the id and save it as metadatum value.
